content: Your skin is simply having oily skin in some areas of your face like the t-zone forehead, nose, and chin and dry skin in other areas. Thereâ€™s a mix of oily and dry areas on different parts of your face.

Your skin produces excess oil on the face that causes a shiny or greasy appearance. Visible enlarge pores, prone to whiteheads/blackheads acne. Acne that appears on the face and frequently on the neck, shoulders, back, and chest too.

Dry/sensitive skin may have acne, rosacea and prone to stinging or burning. Your skin is more prone to a strong reaction to chemicals and scented products. It is easily aggravated by change of weather, pollution, and mostly whatever touches your skin.
Your skin pores are generally small, the skin's texture is smooth, there are no visible blemishes, just very few imperfections, and no sensitivity.
